attributes.action: Call a General Election of all the National Parties as soon as possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For 10 years Labour has been in control, from Tony Blair to Gordon Brown, in this time, Education has gone through numerous and I might add, useless reforms, as have the NHS and the Budget and Funding Cuts of the Armed Forces is atrocious.

I, personally am calling for a General Election within the next few months before the country slips even further into turmoil at the hands of this Government that seems incapable of performing even the simplest of tasks.

I beseech the people of Britain to come to their senses and call for an election, Gordon Brown, though a good Chancellor, seems to me to be a useless and unavoidably inefficient Prime Minister who must be removed from his position through the legal channels, or better still, a new government put in all together.
